snippet: The dynastic Indonesian Bakrie family has proposed a split from the coal mining company Bumi that they helped to create with the British financier Nathaniel Rothschild.
abstract: The dynastic Indonesian Bakrie family has proposed a split from the coal mining company Bumi that they helped to create with the British financier Nathaniel Rothschild.

headline.main: Bakrie Family Offers to Buy Assets from Bumi
